name: UICollectionViewDropProposal
desc: Your proposed solution for handling a drop in a collection view.

items.name: init(operation: UIDropOperation, intent: UICollectionViewDropProposal.Intent)
items.desc: Creates a drop proposal object that specifies how to incorporate the dropped content.

items.name: var intent: UICollectionViewDropProposal.Intent
items.desc: The option to use when incorporating the dropped items into your content.

items.name: enum UICollectionViewDropProposal.Intent
items.desc: Constants indicating how you intend to handle a drop.

items.name: enum UIDropOperation
items.desc: Operation types that determine how a drag and drop activity resolves when the user drops a drag item.
